name: focusblocker
title: FocusBlocker
description: Block websites for a given time to help you focus on work/study
author: Shing Lyu [shing.lyu@gmail.com]

preferences.name: blockTimeout
preferences.title: Block Time
preferences.description: How long do you want to block? (minutes)

preferences.name: enableTimedWarning
preferences.title: Enable Warning Timer
preferences.description: Warn you when you are browsing for too long.

preferences.name: warnTime
preferences.title: Warning Timeout
preferences.description: How long do you want the warning to show up? (minutes)
